title: Simple and useful
text: Kudos to HMRC for releasing a useful and reliable app

title: Good
text: I love the app. It’s fast and available 24/7, but I still need to call from time to time to make sure I have input my information correctly.

title: Doesn’t work with iOS 16.0?
text:
Used to work flawlessly but latest updated  version 14.8.1 just gives a black screen when
opened in iOS 16.0

title: Information is never up to date!
Frustrating when you need to reinstall
text: I installed the app months ago when I was asked to do so on the website and only used it to login on the website which worked ok. I’ve since had to replace my phone and reinstalled the app. NowI can’t get an access code because the app asks me to scan a code from the website and the website doesn’t give me an option to sign on without an access code from the app and I need to wait until Monday to speak to an admin to reset this instead of having an option to sort this out online.
